title: What's in a sandpit?
creator_credit: Ross Campbell and Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre
brief_description: No 2 in a series of in-service science education films produced for the Curriculum and research Branch for discussion purposes. This film is to be used to introduce the new Primary Science course. A group of teachers discuss how they might plan work for their pupils. Various problems are discussed. From the “Science in Primary School” series.
